title: Annual net sales of Amazon 2004 to 2019
yAxis: Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars, about 177.87 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 48.08 was reported at Year 2011
